ygData.msgSnippet: it s on Karana server.  i d rather hold back the guild name so i don t smear their name.  (hoping that I can convince the guild to let bards at least have loot
ygData.messageBody:
it's on Karana server. i'd rather hold back the guild name so i don't smear
their name. (hoping that I can convince the guild to let bards at least
have loot rights to swirlspine and fbss)

with the speed cap, it makes sense for the top-notch speed gear go to the
melee's without a haste song. (since we hit it with just about any haste
item)


-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
Sent: Friday, April 14, 2000 8:15 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] ugh, shutting bards out of lotto getting more
wides pread


I think you should find a new guild, but make sure any close friends you
have in the guild know why you're leaving.

What server/guild is this anyway?

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 songs, Tunare
